response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,200,000 to you, based on our understanding of your needs and preferences. We are excited to offer you this opportunity to own it at an exclusive price of $1,100,000. This special offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while allowing us to maximize the product's worth. We believe this price reflects the quality and benefits you will gain from this investment. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 1100000}
